alert.note: Alert for Cayuga; Onondaga; Seneca (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 07 at 6:01PM EDT until September 07 at 6:30PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Binghamton has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Seneca County in central New York... Central Cayuga County in central New York... Southwestern Onondaga County in central New York... * Until 630 PM EDT. * At 600 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Fleming, or near Auburn, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Onondaga, Syracuse, Auburn, Owasco, Sennett, Fleming, Skaneateles, Marcellus, Jordan, and Montezuma. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
